effects.name: Rune of Cleaving (Permanent)
effects.description: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune deal +1 Damage

scriptData.label: Rune of Cleaving (Permanent)

effects.name: Rune of Cleaving (Temporary)
effects.description: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune deal +1 Damage. Lasts 1 minute.

scriptData.label: Rune of Cleaving (Temporary)
Activate Rune of Cleaving

effects.name: Rune of Fire (Permanent)
effects.description: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune can command it to burst into flames. Weapon illuminates area around wielder like a Torch. Additionally, any time a target hit with this weapon suffers a Critical Hit, he receices an additional Ablaze Condition.

scriptData.label: Rune of Fire (Permanent)
Burst Into Flames
Extinguish Flames

effects.name: Rune of Fire (Temporary)
effects.description: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune can command it to burst into flames. Weapon illuminates area around wielder like a Torch. Additionally, any time a target hit with this weapon suffers a Critical Hit, he receices an additional Ablaze Condition.

scriptData.label: Rune of Fire (Permanent)
Burst Into Flames

effects.name: Rune of Fury (Permanent)
effects.description: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune gains a Furious Assault talent.

scriptData.label: Rune of Fury (Permanent)

effects.name: Rune of Fury (Temporary)
effects.description: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune gains a Furious Assault talent. Lasts 1 minute.

scriptData.label: Rune of Fury (Temporary)
Activate Rune of Fury

effects.name: Rune of Grudges (Permanent)
effects.description: Character wielding weapon Engraved with this Rune can, on the first Round of Combat, nominate an enemy as the Target of this Rune. For the remainder of the Combat, you can reroll all failed attacks against the Target.

scriptData.label: Rune of Grudges (Permanent)

effects.name: Rune of Grudges (Temporary)
effects.description: Character wielding weapon Engraved with this Rune can, on the first Round of Combat, nominate an enemy as the Target of this Rune. For the remainder of the Combat, you can reroll all failed attacks against the Target. One use only.

scriptData.label: End Grudge
scriptData.script: this.effect.update({disabled: true});

scriptData.label: Activate Rune of Grudges

effects.name: Rune of Might (Permanent)
effects.description: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune against a target with Toughness Bonus 5 or more are treated as if the attacker had double Strength Bonus.

scriptData.label: Rune of Might (Permanent)

effects.name: Rune of Might (Temporary)
effects.description: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune against a target with Toughness Bonus 5 or more are treated as if the attacker had double Strength Bonus. Lasts 1 minute.

scriptData.label: Rune of Might (Temporary)
Activate Rune of Might

effects.name: Rune of Speed (Permanent)
effects.description: If the wielder is not Surprised and has this weapon in hands at the start of the Combat, he gains +1d10 bonus to his combat initiative score.

scriptData.label: Rune of Speed (Permanent)

effects.name: Rune of Speed (Temporary)
effects.description: If the wielder is not Surprised and has this weapon in hands at the start of the Combat, he gains +1d10 bonus to his combat initiative score. Can only be activated once.

scriptData.label: Rune of Speed (Temporary)
Activate Rune of Speed

effects.name: Rune of Striking (Permanent)
effects.description: Weapon Engraved with this Rune grants whoever wields it additional +10 Weapon Skill.

effects.name: Rune of Striking (Temporary)
effects.description: Weapon Engraved with this Rune grants whoever wields it additional +10 Weapon Skill. Lasts 1 minute.

scriptData.label: Activate Rune of Striking

effects.name: Rune of Durability (Permanent)
effects.description: Weapon Engraved with this Rune gains Unbreakable Quality.

scriptData.label: Rune of Durability (Permanent)
scriptData.script: args.item.system.qualities.value.push({name: "unbreakable", value: null});

effects.name: Rune of Durability (Temporary)
effects.description: Weapon Engraved with this Rune gains Unbreakable Quality. Lasts 1 minute

scriptData.label: Rune of Durability (Temporary)
scriptData.script: args.item.system.qualities.value.push({name: "unbreakable", value: null});

scriptData.label: Activate Rune of Durability

effects.name: Rune of Fracture (Permanent)
effects.description: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune can command it to be overcome with power surge. Weapon gains @Property[Impact] Quality, but loses 2 Damage per attack.

scriptData.label: Rune of Fire (Permanent)
scriptData.script: this.item.system.qualities.value.push({name: 'impact', value: null});

scriptData.label: Surge with power
Dissipate power
Fracture
